A lot has changed for our 1.7 release! All new users will experience our onboarding that highlights the best of our app. If you're signed in you can sign out from Settings to experience this for yourself. We redesigned the way you add books to Speechify; it's super easy and we know you'll love it. Now, listening to books is better than ever before. We even have a new tutorial for importing from the web. We've fixed a ton of bugs and made huge performance improvements. Let us know how you use Speechify!

Hi, Cliff here! Welcome you to the new release of Speechify! We're excited to release an improved, more useful experience for you. In this release, we added the following features:

1. In upgrading to Speechify Pro, you will now be offered a monthly subscription.
2. You can invite friends as a way to continue your free trial of the app!
3. Fixed various user interface bugs so your experience with Speechify will be even more beautiful.

Hey lovely users,

In the newest version of the app, you will once again have an astonishing experience. We focused on perfecting the way PDFs and web articles are converted to audiobooks. We cleared out most glitches while listening to a book and worked really hard on making the app less confusing to the upcoming members of our family. Plus one bonus: now you can save time and login with your Facebook account.

If you have any issues or suggestions don't hesitate to email us: hello.cliff@getspeechify.com

Hey everyone,

As always we did our best to improve the current version of the app so you can have an amazing experience.
New:
- Fluent onboarding which makes you understand the app easier
- Removed required Signed in/Signed up - you jump into using the app immediately
Enhancements:
- We fixed the bugs our users have seen
- We did everything possible to make sure this version is better than the previous

Hope you enjoy the update. If you have any questions email us at hello.cliff@getspeechify.com

Hey all,
The last couple of months we have been working really hard to understand what you want the most and how we can deliver it the best possible way. That is why I am thrilled to introduce you this new release which transforms that way you use Speechify for listening. Now you are able to have more control over the content of your book on listening mode, better UI (which you will love) and many more things. We hope you find it useful and can't wait to hear your feedback. All the best from the Speechify team.

Hey y'all! Your wonderful feedback inspired us to hustle hard these past few weeks to improve performance, squash bugs, and lay the path for great things to come. As always, please let us know if we can improve your experience in any way by using the in-app "Message Us" function.

Bug Fixes:
- Improved Highlighting
- Pinch to Zoom
- More Precise Speed Adjustment
- UI Enhancements
- Speed & Reliability Improvements
- Support for Large PDFs

Love, The Speechify Team

Howdy Speechifiers,

We're super excited to bring this amazing update straight to your device!
Features include:
An amazing new experience when you add books with your camera
An epic new voice (in beta)
Anytime there's a web address or long text in your clipboard, you can make a book from it in one tap

Check out these features and let us know what you think, using the "message us" button in the bottom right corner of the app.

With love,
The Speechify Team

Hello to you all,

We are trilled to present you this update for which we worked really hard day and night. It includes:
- Offline support for library;
- New amazing voice;
- Updated Text import
- Ability to create book from images and camera roll photos;
- Pasting a link to import a web article;
- Many bug fixes;

We will continue trying to improve the product based on your desires so any suggestion and recommendation is more than welcome. Just message us by clicking the "Message us" button on the main screen or on the email: hello.cliff@getspeechify.com

Lots of love from the Speechify team <3

Hey all,

It's July 4th, so happy birthday to America, and happy birthday to you! Because your Speechify app just got some major improvements, that we've been working hard on:)

This update includes:
- Offline support -> Listen to your books on airplane mode!
- Improved scan feature -> One of our best features just got even better!
- Speed and volume control redesigns -> They look beeaauutiful.
- And as always, some bug and crash fixes.

Enjoy!

Love,

The Speechify Team

Hey Speechifiers!

We're so excited to announce the greatest leap in features since the original version of Speechify.

These features include, but not limited to:
- A NEW Speechify Blue
- A Design Overhaul
- Folders to organize your files
- A NEW Importing Experience
- Integration with Google Drive

We hope you enjoy!

Love,
- The Speechify Team

Hello lovely Speechify users,

We have been working really hard this past week to make sure your app is stable, not buggy and provides good experience:
Things we have fixed:
- Bug and crashes;
- Listening screen polish;
- Different screen sizes;
- Fixed cropping of pages;
- Support for iOS12;

We hope you enjoy the update. Thank you so much!

Love,
The Speechify Team

Hey Speechify users,
This is a long waited version for which we worked extremely hard to deliver with many improvements both in functionality and visual experience. We are confident you will love it. Please communicate with us your feedback at info@getspeechify.com :)

Some improvements include:
1. Brand new design on library, home, settings, texts and screen for importing web articles.
2. New subscription which allows you to purchase up to 1M HD words per month. Now you will be able to enjoy much more of your favorite voices. This functionality will roll out gradually to all users. Please contact info@getspeechify.com if you don’t see it in the application but want to purchase.
3. Internal improvements for storing files, importing content into the application, scanning books and more.
4. Bug fixes.

Thank you for the amazing support, hope you enjoy all these new benefits.
